projects: [{"title":"TSUNAMI PREDICTION AND SUBSEQUENT EVACUATION MODEL","start_date":"Jan 2020","end_date":"Feb 2020","description":" Made a working prototype using IBM’s Watson Machine learning services training past 3000 datasets for tsunami prediction, evaluating the affected area and assessing evacuation of people in the affected area. Produced a 98.01% accuracy for the next prediction for the safety measures of people and formed a business model for the same."}]
